info.name: ASP.NET Core Web API Deep Dive

item.name: POST Author to single resource URI
POST Course for Author (title too long, description null)
POST Course for Author (long title == long description)
PUT Course for Author (null title == null description)
PATCH Course for Author (copy and add)
PATCH Course for Author (remove unexisting property)
PATCH Course for Author (UPSERT - no title)
PATCH Course for Author (UPSERT - remove unexisting property)
GET Authors (orderBy = name desc, pageNumber = 2, pageSize = 10)
GET Authors (orderBy = name, searchQuery = a, mainCategory = Rum, pageNumber = 1, pageSize = 2)
GET Authors (orderBy = name, searchQuery = a, mainCategory = Rum, pageNumber = 1, pageSize = 2, fields = id, name)
POST Author with Date of Death (application/vnd.marvin.authorforcreationwithdateofdeath+json)
